page.title: 08RACING STABLES
page.content:
Every day a string of race horses passes our classroom window on their daily exercise through the village. On Thursday the 4th of July we went down to the racing stables to find out about them. {Five people work}for the owner.
. Every morning any weather they have to do the same routine,at 1.7am feed horses. Muck out 4 horses each. 9am they feed the horses first then themselves.At 9.30am ride out 3 horses each for exercise,gallop or road work.Come back wash down ,groom & make them comfortable.1pm feed horses.1.15 pm feed theemselves.At 2.30pm groom horses,spend a good half hour on them. 5.30pm feed horses check water & bedding.6.00pm finish work.9.00pm extra feed if necessary.
